definitions: the action or process of settling among and establishing control over the indigenous people of an area

examples.text: Africa boasts a tradition of higher education institutions that predate Western colonization
the European invasion and colonization of the Americas

shortDefinitions: action or process of settling among and establishing control over indigenous people of area

definitions: the action of appropriating a place or domain for one's own use

examples.text: the complete colonization of television entertainment by reality shows

shortDefinitions: action of appropriating place or domain for one's own use

definitions: the action by a plant or animal of establishing itself in an area

examples.text: suitable sites for colonization by Asian crabs

shortDefinitions: action of establishing itself in an area
